EmailTemplate.subject: Your Honeywell Tech Pubs Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your publication(s) {!Case.Publication_Number__c} are now available through the MyAerospace portal.
We've made some changes to the technical publication web page since you were there last
To view your "collection" of documents:
1. Log on to the portal using your new user id XXXX and password then submit.
2. On the next screen click on the Technical Publication box. This will bring you to the Search Publication screen.
3. Enter your pub number, #####, into the search field and click on search.
4. Click the "View Collection" link in the right column.
5. On the gray bar near the top of the page, click on Manuals. A drop down will appear, click on Collection Manuals. This will bring up all the publications for the collection you require.
For additional publications, click on "Request this Publication"
and submit to your shopping cart.
For Case Related Questions?
Weâ€™ll connect all of your order details through the subject line of this email. So, should you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
